name: Crazy Monster Stunts Race
description:
Crazy Monster Stunts Race is a addictive and fun 3D game dedicated to all the monster truck fans! it's a free racing game! Enjoy the speed and furious brought!Take your driving skills to one step ahead
Features:

- Exciting stunt performing missions to become the stunt master of all times
- Extreme rally driving game play to unleash your soul in the modern era game play
- Breathtaking tracks, off-road hill sides, lush green yards
- Monster wheels to enjoy heavy duty driving experience
- Varying career levels and 3D graphics to enjoy better ride
